Body:
"""Ensure mass fractions that do not sum to 1.0 raise validation error

        This test will fail until https://github.com/pyeve/cerberus/issues/278
        in Cerberus is fixed.
        """
v.validate(properties)
assert 'Species mass fractions do not sum to 1.0: 0.300000' in v.errors[
    'datapoints'][0][1][0]['composition']
pytest.mark.xfail(raises=NotImplementedError)pytest.mark.parametrize('properties', ['testfile_bad.yaml'], indirect=[
    'properties'])
